# DBSLMMread

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of DBSLMMread is to read intermediate C++ Armadillo "fields" from 
`DBSLMM` and, with them, calculate the variances of the predicted 
values using the DBSLMM model.
